---
name: "Club Communication Tools"
about: "Feature request for communication tools for club members."
title: "[Feature] Club Communication Tools"
labels: [enhancement]
---

## Feature Description
Implement communication tools for club members, such as forums, chat, or notifications. Allow members to discuss, share updates, and receive important announcements from club leaders.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Members can post and reply in club forums or chat
- Admins can send announcements to all members
- Notification system for new messages or updates

## Additional Notes
Consider moderation and privacy controls for communication features.
